# Data wrangling

## Introduction

The ANES 2016 Time Series Study.
- Download the User Guide and Codebook: https://electionstudies.org/data-center/2016-time-series-study/


```{r eval=FALSE}

# Load the tidyverse package

# ...
data_url <- "https://github.com/mickaeltemporao/CMT4A-CMSS-TEMPLATE/blob/main/data/ts_2016.rds"

# ...
if(!file.exists("ts_2016.rds")) {
  download.file(data_url, "ts_2016.rds")
}

# ...
tb <- readRDS("ts_2016.rds")

# Check the dataset
# class, head, dim, ...

```

## Filter

```{r eval=FALSE}
# The Filter Verb & The Pipe
## Keep respondents who voted in 2012
tb %>%
  filter(V161005 == 1)

## Keep respondents below 25 years old

## Store these in a new object call young_voters

```

## Arrange

```{r eval=FALSE}
# The Arrange Verb
## Sort respondents by age
tb %>%
  arrange(V161267)

## Pipe filter and arrange into a single operation

## Store this in a new object call young_voters

```

## Mutate

```{r eval=FALSE}
# The Mutate Verb
## Replace
tb %>%
  arrange(V161267)

## Pipe filter and arrange into a single operation

## Store this in a new object call young_voters

```
